Title: WPFMVVMSamples
Description: Prototype for displaying prompt windows and get user response to continue a process. The App is built using C# WPF(.NET 4.5.1), Modern UI for WPF and MVVM.
HomeWiki:
Modern UI Prompt Windows

A prototype using Modern UI for WPF and MVVM to Display Prompt Windows inorder to receive response from the User which in turn maybe used to continue a process or perform an action based on the given input.
